originalText.text: Excellent practice. Support staff is friendly and great at Following up. The wait was minimal, although I was late, the receptionist squeezed me in and I was seen.  Dr. Amit has excellent bedside manner. He throughly explained my condition in detail. He was very patient and answered  ALL of my questions. I will be returning and would recommend this Practice!!

Dr. Amit has excellent bedside manner. He throughly explained my condition in detail. He was very patient and answered  ALL of my questions. I will be returning and would recommend this Practice!!

originalText.text: This doctor along with 95 percent of the staff was amazing. They had me feeling very comfortable the whole time from the front desk all the way to the surgery. The doctor explained exactly what pain I will feel and for how long and he was right, after that I was smooth sailing. I left the place with complete confidence. Would 10 out of 10 go back and recommend everyone to go there.

Would 10 out of 10 go back and recommend everyone to go there.

originalText.text:
Dr. Kalra is such a professional at his job. Wonderful bedside manner, he listens to you and figures out different solutions for you. He takes great care of me and my kids' feet. He opened an honest person. My son is on the Autism Spectrum, and he explains everything to him. My son is comfortable with Dr. Kalra. My son responds to him very well. He respects Dr. Kalra.

I just had a in-office procedure yesterday, we talked about it because I was alittle apprehensive about having another in-office procedure since my very first-time there a few years back with another Doctor. But all in all he put me at ease üòå and then we got the show on the road. Very efficient and fast procedure, time was 30 minutes. Was given beforehand everything I needed. I go back in two weeks which the appointment was set right after. Dr. Kalra is amazing!

Thank you, Dr. Kalra

originalText.text: I went for the first time to Starrett Podiatry.  The reception staff were professional and very friendly, as were all of the staff.  Very patient with all of my questions.  Dr. Kalra was terrific.  He spent a lot of time explaining my condition and how to prevent recurrences.  He gave me exercises and other recommendations.  This is the best podiatric care I've received in NYC.  I highly recommend Dr. Kalra and Starrett.
